data.name: SbisWebsiteName
data.value: SBIS Everything about companies and their owners

data.name: InfoSetDefaultDueDiligenceWebsite
data.value: Due diligence website will be selected by the system

data.name: ErrorDefaultDueDiligenceWebsiteNotFound
data.value: Websites for counterparty due diligence are not configured. Contact your administrator

data.name: ErrorInvalidMask
data.value: Enter a correct search mask. For PSRN - {0}, for TIN - {1}

data.name: ErrorUrlNotSet
data.value: Fill in URL template for counterparty due diligence website

data.name: SbisNote
data.value:
This website allows you to get company details, contact information, reliability rating, extracts from Unified State Register of Legal Entities and Entrepreneurs as well as view company's financial standing and business value.
On the website, you can see tenders and government contracts the company was involved in and get information on its owners and affiliates.
To take full advantage of website features, you have to acquire license "SBIS Everything about companies and their owners".

data.name: OwnerOnlineNote
data.value:
This website allows you to get company details, its financial statements and reliablility rating. You can also generate due diligence certificate and order extract from Unified State Register of Legal Entities and Entrepreneurs.
With a paid subscription, you can get additional information, e.g., reliability report.

data.name: KonturFocusNote
data.value:
This website allows you to get company details, contact information and information about participation in arbitration proceedings, extracts from Unified State Register of Legal Entities and Entrepreneurs, financial analysis and reports based on the Russian Federal State Statistics Service data.
By using this website, you can get information about pledges and charges, state purchases, bankruptcy declarations, scheduled inspections, trademarks, licenses and permissions, mentions on the internet.
The website searches for and analyses connections, generates an express report on counterparties.
To take full advantage of website features, you have to acquire a "Kontur.Focus" license.

data.name: HonestBusinessNote
data.value:
This website allows you to get company details, contact information, reliability rating based on risks and reliability criteria, financial statements, information about participation in arbitration proceedings.
By using this website, you can get information about enforcement proceedings, trademarks, disqualified individuals, mass registration addresses, licensed activities and licenses. Due diligence of individual entrepreneurs is not supported.
To take full advantage of website features, you have to register.

data.name: ForFairBusinessNote
data.value:
This website allows you to get company details, information about participation in arbitration proceedings, financial statements and form contract requisites.
This website does not require registration or payment.
